definition: congruence (math.)/equation for residue modulo some number
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: The matrix method of solving diphantine equations and congruence expressions is developed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 給出了線性不定方程組與線性同餘式組的新矩陣解法。

sentences.english: In this paper, a conversion theorem of equal values for complementation and congruent is also given.
sentences.chinese: 同時還給出互餘式組與同餘式組的一個等價轉換定理。
